#summary Reset Template

= Reset Template =

|| *URI* || `https://api.passkit.com/v1/template/`<font color="blue">{templateName}</font>`/reset` <font color="grey"> _/push_ (optional)</font> <font color="grey"> _/?format=xml_ (optional)</font> ||
|| *Verb* || GET, POST, PUT ||
|| *Auth* || Yes ||

This method resets each pass record to the default values. This only affects values that the user cannot edit. The method also removes all data-fields from each pass record. 

Each pass can have an unlimited number of fields that start with "data-". These fields do not show up on the pass, but are attached to the pass record and thus returned with every request for pass data.

If you wish for the update to be immediately pushed to all devices with an active, include push as the last segment of the URL.

== URL Parameters ==

  * <font color="blue">*templateName*</font> <font color="green">_(string)_</font> The name of the template for the pass records to be reset.

=== cURL Syntax ===

*Get request:*

<code>curl --digest -u {APIKey}:{APISecret} "https://api.passkit.com/v1/template/{templateName}/reset/push"</code>

----
  
== Response Examples ==

==== JSON Format ====

<code language="json">
{
  "success":true,
  "devices": {
    "device_1": "a7fc7ff20ef26c95808ab820e2aa797e0c590df760febd974051287779ec69f5"
     }
}</code>

==== XML Format ====

_Note that for XML responses, spaces in tag names will be replaced by 'middle dot' (Â·).  If a tag starts with an invalid character (E.g. a Number), the tag will be prexied with two underscores (`__`_)_
{{{
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<PassKit_API_Response>
    <success>1</success>
    <devices>
        <device_1>a7fc7ff20ef26c95808ab820e2aa797e0c590df760febd974051287779ec69f5</device_1>
    </devices>
</PassKit_API_Response>
}}}

=== Response Parameters === 
  * *<font color="blue">success</font>* <font color="green">_(string)_</font>
    *_ Will return <font color="purple">true</font> for a successful submission, or will not be present in the case of an error.
  * *<font color="blue">devices</font>* <font color="green">_(array)_</font>
    *_ A list of the deviceIDs for which a push request has been dispatched to Apple.
